DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study to assess the image quality of the rapid MRI compared to the standard MRI.
DOC.criteria: 1. underlying liver disease 2. have a lesion on a prior imaging study 3. must have prior standard MR 1. Contraindication for MR imaging including pacemaker, claustrophobia, pregnancy, electronic or vascular devices that are contraindicated; 2. patients with severe kidney dysfunction
